resources.string: This game was made for UVA CS2110 Fall 2014 by Jing, Torry, Andrea, and ZiYan. The menu music is a remixed version of Lavender Town from Pokemon. The in-game music is Guitar vs. Piano 1.2 from Newgrounds.

To move your character around, touch or slide your finger around the screen. The kill the ghosts, simply run into them with your character. Ghosts will drop coins when killed and these coins allow bombs to spawn. Picking up a bomb will instantly kill all ghosts on screen. Enjoy the game!!
